column4: Hi! When installing Ubuntu 8.10 on the Acer Aspire One A110L, is it possible to use two SD cards for swap and /home, respectively?
sure, just stick to the manual partitioning, if you're familiar with that
Ok, thanks! Do you know if 20MB/s is enough for the SDs, or will it make the system too slow?
I'm not experienced with hardware, but I think it's enough; swap should be as fast as possible, though
